name: Water Shooting Pool Gun Arena
description:
Water Gun Shooting Arena is amazing FPS + TPS game where in you are in a water park with a water gun to shoot water on your friends and have fun.

In this game you are equipped with a water gun and you have to shoot water at your friends and enjoy this water fighting simulator to the utmost.

In this nerf gun simulator you will find a lot of different toy guns to choose from!
If you have been searching for an ultimate weapon simulator with lot of different toy guns, realistic weapon sounds and effects then this nerf Water Gun Simulator is just for you! Just click on trigger and here the water pool party begins!

Features:
- Easy to pickup, hard to master!
- Real physics with hundreds of parameters to ensure a fun experience
- Intuitive, one finger controls
- Role playing mode
- Choose in between many players
- Smooth gameplay

It requires fast fingers, impeccable timing, and smart strategy
to defeat your opponents and claim rewards.
